messages.subject: Hiya! New
messages.msgSnippet: I am Melinda 25 happily married to my best friend and the love of my life Chris we have two beautiful children Alexis almost 5 and Nick 2 years. Chris is a IT
messages.messageBody:
I am Melinda 25 happily married to my best friend and the love of my
life Chris we have two beautiful children Alexis almost 5 and Nick 2
years.
Chris is a IT engineer and I am SAHM we live in Upstate New York

My hobbies are family, traveling, photography, movies, music, water,
cruising, picnics, crafts, reading and just having fun!!

We are currently home schooling our daughter in preschool level
material with a little kindergarten thrown in for a challenge she is
doing wonderful and is learning a lot she is a true blessing to teach
I do share files on AIM & ICQ if that is allowed here please add me
let me know where you are coming from
Aim- Mel14094
ICQ- 226-839-979

I look forward to meeting everyone and joining your family

HugsÂ….
Melinda
